text: in modern organizations there are a
number of different roles including
business analysts data scientists and
developers who are building machine
learning models each using their own set
of tools and environments in the past
these machine learning tools did not
talk to each other resulting in silos
and duplication of effort wasting
valuable time and resources now there is
Amazon's sagemaker canvas with just one
click you can bring a machine learning
model developed in any tool register it
in the sagemaker model registry and
bring it into sagemaker canvas you can
generate predictions on the model
directly in sagemaker canvas making it
much easier for both Technical and
non-technical users to standardize on a
single tool and collaborate across the
organization
democratize machine learning today with
Amazon sagemaker canvas
